00276 
00277     def update(
00278         self,
00279         name,
00280         *args):
00281 
00282         #print "MicropolisBudgetPanel update", name, args
00283 
00284         engine = self.engine
00285 
00286         if name  == 'taxRate':
00287 
00288             taxRate = engine.cityTax
00289             scaleTaxRate = self.scaleTaxRate
00290             if scaleTaxRate.get_value() != taxRate:
00291                 scaleTaxRate.set_value(taxRate)
00292             label = str(taxRate) + '%'
00293             self.labelTaxRate2.set_text(label)
00294 
00295         elif name == 'budget':
00296 
00297             formatMoney = engine.formatMoney
00298             formatPercent = engine.formatPercent
00299 
00300             totalFunds = engine.totalFunds
00301             taxFund = engine.taxFund
00302             fireFund = engine.fireFund
00303             fireValue = engine.fireValue
00304             firePercent = engine.firePercent
00305             policeFund = engine.policeFund
00306             policeValue = engine.policeValue
00307             policePercent = engine.policePercent
00308             roadFund = engine.roadFund
00309             roadValue = engine.roadValue
00310             roadPercent = engine.roadPercent
00311 
00312             cashFlow = (
00313                 taxFund -
00314                 fireValue -
00315                 policeValue -
00316                 roadValue)
00317 
00318             cashFlow2 = cashFlow
00319 
00320             if cashFlow == 0:
00321                 cashFlowString = "$0"
00322             elif cashFlow > 0:
00323                 cashFlowString = "+" + formatMoney(cashFlow)
00324             else:
00325                 cashFlowString = "-" + formatMoney(-cashFlow)
00326 
00327             previousString = formatMoney(totalFunds)
00328             currentString = formatMoney(cashFlow2 + totalFunds)
00329             collectedString = formatMoney(taxFund)
00330 
00331             fireWantString = formatMoney(fireFund)
00332             firePercentString = formatPercent(firePercent)
00333             fireGotString = formatMoney(int(fireFund * firePercent))
00334 
00335             policeWantString = formatMoney(policeFund)
00336             policePercentString = formatPercent(policePercent)
00337             policeGotString = formatMoney(int(fireFund * policePercent))
00338 
00339             roadWantString = formatMoney(roadFund)
00340             roadPercentString = formatPercent(roadPercent)
00341             roadGotString = formatMoney(int(roadFund * roadPercent))
00342 
00343             self.labelBudget1.set_text('Taxes Collected: ' + collectedString)
00344             self.labelBudget2.set_text('Cash Flow: ' + cashFlowString)
00345             self.labelBudget3.set_text('Previous Funds: ' + previousString)
00346             self.labelBudget4.set_text('Current Funds: ' + currentString)
00347 
00348             self.labelFireFund.set_text('Request: ' + fireWantString)
00349             self.labelFirePercent.set_text(firePercentString + ' = ' + fireGotString)
00350             value = int(firePercent * 100.0)
00351             if self.scaleFirePercent.get_value() != value:
00352                 self.scaleFirePercent.set_value(value)
00353 
00354             self.labelPoliceFund.set_text('Request: ' + policeWantString)
00355             self.labelPolicePercent.set_text(policePercentString + ' = ' + policeGotString)
00356             value = int(policePercent * 100.0)
00357             if self.scalePolicePercent.get_value() != value:
00358                 self.scalePolicePercent.set_value(value)
00359 
00360             self.labelRoadFund.set_text('Request: ' + roadWantString)
00361             self.labelRoadPercent.set_text(roadPercentString + ' = ' + roadGotString)
00362             value = int(roadPercent * 100.0)
00363             if self.scaleRoadPercent.get_value() != value:
00364                 self.scaleRoadPercent.set_value(value)
00365 
00366 
00367     def taxScaleChanged(self, scale):
00368         engine = self.engine
00369         tax = int(scale.get_value())
00370         if tax != engine.cityTax:
00371             engine.setCityTax(tax)
00372 
00373 
00374     def fireScaleChanged(self, scale):
00375         engine = self.engine
00376         fire = scale.get_value() / 100.0
00377         engine.firePercent = fire
00378         engine.fireSpend = int(fire * engine.fireFund)
00379         engine.updateFundEffects()
00380         engine.mustDrawBudget = True
00381 
00382 
00383     def policeScaleChanged(self, scale):
00384         engine = self.engine
00385         police = scale.get_value() / 100.0
00386         engine.policePercent = police
00387         engine.policeSpend = int(police * engine.policeFund)
00388         engine.updateFundEffects()
00389         engine.mustDrawBudget = True
00390 
00391 
00392     def roadScaleChanged(self, scale):
00393         engine = self.engine
00394         road = scale.get_value() / 100.0
00395         engine.roadPercent = road
00396         engine.roadSpend = int(road * engine.roadFund)
00397         engine.updateFundEffects()
00398         engine.mustDrawBudget = True
00399
